VMware

action_list.description: System action for installing an application
action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
sudo systemctl disable firewalld
sudo systemctl stop firewalld
sudo timedatectl set-timezone 
sudo yum -y install ntp
sudo systemctl restart ntpd
sudo systemctl enable ntpd
sudo rpm -Uvh https://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet5/puppet5-release-el-7.noarch.rpm
gpg --yes --keyserver pgp.mit.edu --recv-key 7F438280EF8D349F
gpg --yes --list-key --fingerprint 7F438280EF8D349F
sudo yum install -y puppetserver

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# Script Variables & Constants
PUPPET_VERSION="@@{PUPPET_VERSION}@@"

# install puppet release rpm and puppet server.
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo rpm -Uvh "http://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet${PUPPET_VERSION}-release-el-7.noarch.rpm"
sudo yum install -y puppetserver
#!/bin/bash

task_definition_list.description: System action for creating an application
task_definition_list.name: action_create

runbook.description: System action for uninstalling an application
runbook.name: action_uninstall

PUPPET_VERSION="@@{PUPPET_VERSION}@@"

# install puppet release rpm and puppet server.
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo rpm -Uvh "http://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet${PUPPET_VERSION}-release-el-7.noarch.rpm"
sudo yum install -y puppetserver
#!/bin/bash

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
sudo systemctl disable firewalld
sudo systemctl stop firewalld
sudo timedatectl set-timezone 
sudo yum -y install ntp
sudo systemctl restart ntpd
sudo systemctl enable ntpd
sudo rpm -Uvh https://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet5/puppet5-release-el-7.noarch.rpm
gpg --yes --keyserver pgp.mit.edu --recv-key 7F438280EF8D349F
gpg --yes --list-key --fingerprint 7F438280EF8D349F
sudo yum install -y puppetserver

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

guest_customization.cloud_init:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
